# logger.get_logger { #dareplane_utils.logging.logger.get_logger }

```python
logging.logger.get_logger(
    name,
    add_console_handler=False,
    colors=colors,
    no_socket_handler=False,
)
```

Get a configured logger.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name                | Type   | Description                                                                       | Default    |
|---------------------|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| name                | str    | The name of the logger.                                                           | _required_ |
| add_console_handler | bool   | If True, add a console handler to the logger (default is False).                  | `False`    |
| colors              | dict   | A dictionary of colors for log levels (default is `colors`).                      | `colors`   |
| no_socket_handler   | bool   | If True, opt out of adding a socket handler for TCP streaming (default is False). | `False`    |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type           | Description            |
|--------|----------------|------------------------|
|        | logging.Logger | The configured logger. |
